posts.post_content: i only have a hand full so if anyone is looking to sell raw or graded 2-3's, send me a PM with what you have any what your asking price is.
Bought 1 card from a board member already still looking for more t205.  PM me if your looking to sell any with a scan and an asking price.
thanks to all those who responded, made 2 deals so far hoping to make a few more.

4 deals and counting,  - FYI if anyone has and is looking to sell T205 backs, of:

Blank back, Drum, Hindu, or broadleaf, I could be interested.  poor to good condition depending on the back and the price

I have a bunch - all Pirates (35 cards in all, diff F/B combos, graded & raw...)  See scans and and prices at [url]http://imageevent.com/gspinf/forsaletrade/t205[/url]

Let me know if you have any interest.

Thanks, and good luck with you quest!
--
Mike

Only have 30 or so t205's so far so still looking - most guys still needed, as well as the more rare backs, ie - drum, broadleaf, hindu and blank, (if i can afford them) also would love to add a miscut, ghost, "freak" etc.

Have made 5 deals with guys from here so far and everyone has been a great transaction.  And waiting on 2 to be delevered.

you can e-mail me scans (front and back) along with your asking price.

[url]EvilKing00@yahoo.com[/url]

Have compleated a few deals with some great sellers so far just wanted to give them credit for a great transaction!

thanks to Drumback, Mart8081, Obcmac, Tonyo, markf31 & gnaz01

I have 33 T205's now and counting, still alot to go if anyone has any for sale.  Looking for raw - 4's basicly, still need AB Black, Broadleaf black & Green, Hindu, drum and blank backs

Print errors would be interesting too

Email - [url]EvilKing00@yahoo.com[/url]

I have 2 
[url]http://s1098.photobucket.com/albums/g369/zachclose21/T%20cards/[/url]
lmk if you need these
thanks zach

I have several that you may need.  I have the rare backs also.  Message me and I can email you what I have. 
Thanks,
Cory

thanks to Drumback, Mart8081, Obcmac, Tonyo, markf31 & gnaz01 for smooth deals, all trust worthy sellers.

If you have any t205's shoot me an email with scans of front and backs with your asking price im still looking for most of the set.

Also looking for babe ruth cards/stuff, would love to get a w512, lower end or A.

Pretty decent SP Kirb White VG range some dirt on back but otherwise decent card. $80 dlvd.

[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/nollpm/for-saletrade[/url]
